io.smudgr.engine.param

Class UnivariateParameter

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.smudgr.engine.param.Parameter
      • io.smudgr.engine.param.UnivariateParameter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Controllable, ProjectItem, ReflectableType

    public class UnivariateParameter
extends Parameter
    The UnivariateParameter class is a Parameter implementation for switching between UnivariateFunction functions that take a single numeric variable, and return a single numeric value.

    UnivariateParameter instances can be used to switch between manipulation functions.

    See Also:
    UnivariateFunction

      • getTypeIdentifier

        public java.lang.String getTypeIdentifier()
        Description copied from interface: ReflectableType
        This should return a unique identifier of this type implementation.

        The name that this type implementation is identified to the user with may differ from this identifier. This concept is similar to a 'slug'.

        Implementations of a type should use this method to distinguish themselves.

        The String returned by this method should be changed between versions.

        Returns:
        String that will enumerate this implementation across versions of the application
        See Also:
        ReflectableType.getTypeCategoryIdentifier(), ReflectableType.getTypeName()
